commit message:
Potential OOM crash fix

While I can't recreate the issue as I don't have an anime list long
enough (not even my everything list), this commit employs the use of
WeakReferences in the ImageDownloader in order to allow the system to
reclaim memory for the new bitmaps as the list continues to be scrolled.

-TODO: Need to find out the cause of the scrolling jank and fix it
